org.springframework.integration.dsl

Class MessageSources

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.dsl.MessageSources

  • public class MessageSources
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides various factory methods for MessageSourceSpecs from Namespace Factories. *
    Author:
    Artem Bilan *
    See Also:
    IntegrationFlows.from(IntegrationFlows.MessageSourcesFunction)

      • script

        public ScriptMessageSourceSpec script(org.springframework.core.io.Resource scriptResource)
        Factory for the ScriptMessageSourceSpec based on the Resource. The Resource must represent the real file and can be injected like: 
          @Value("com/my/project/scripts/FilterScript.groovy")
  private Resource filterScript;
        Parameters:
        scriptResource - the script Resource
        Returns:
        the ScriptMessageSourceSpec
        Since:
        1.1

      • script

        public ScriptMessageSourceSpec script(java.lang.String scriptLocation)
        Factory for the ScriptMessageSourceSpec based on the script location.
        Parameters:
        scriptLocation - the path to the script file. file:, ftp:, s3: etc. The classpath: can be omitted.
        Returns:
        the ScriptMessageSourceSpec
        Since:
        1.1

      • feed

        public FeedEntryMessageSourceSpec feed(java.net.URL feedUrl,
                                       java.lang.String metadataKey)
        Factory for the FeedEntryMessageSourceSpec based on the feedUrl and metadataKey.
        Parameters:
        feedUrl - the URL for Feed resource.
        metadataKey - the metadata key to the last entry after fetching.
        Returns:
        the FeedEntryMessageSourceSpec
        Since:
        1.1
